mapper.select: select room.id, course, school_class, username as teacher_name, avatar as teacher_avatar, paper_id from room,user,student_paper where room.id = student_paper.room_id and room.teacher_id = user.id and room.id=#{roomId} and student_id = #{studentId}

select room.id as id, course, school_class, username as teacher_name, avatar as teacher_avatar from room,room_student_merge,user where room.teacher_id = user.id and room.id = room_id and student_id=#{studentId} and archive_status = #{archiveStatus}
select room.id as id, course, school_class, username as teacher_name, avatar as teacher_avatar from room,user where room.teacher_id = user.id and room.id=#{roomId}

select room.id as id, course, school_class, count(room_student_merge.id) as student_number from room left join room_student_merge on room.id = room_student_merge.room_id and room.id=#{roomId} group by room.id
select room.id as id, course, school_class from room,room_student_merge where room.id = room_id and student_id=#{studentId} and archive_status = 1
